      • indexSizes

        public Map<String,Long> indexSizes()
        Specified by:
        indexSizes in interface Statistics
        Returns:
        a map of all index names and the size of the corresponding index, in bytes. The map key is the index name (which may differ from the entity name, depending on configuration settings).
